meanings.definition: A member of a race of serpent people in Hindu and Buddhist mythology.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient story, the naga lived in the deep forests.
meanings.sent2: The naga was depicted as a wise and powerful being.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous naga played a prank on the other mythical creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements were likened to those of a naga.
meanings.sent5: The naga's scales shimmered in the sunlight, captivating all who saw.

meanings.definition: A type of hot chili pepper.
meanings.sent1: The spicy naga added a kick to the dish.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally bit into a naga and my mouth was on fire!
meanings.sent3: The cook mistakenly used a naga instead of a bell pepper in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The heat of the naga pepper was like a fiery dragon in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to touch your eyes after handling a naga pepper!

meanings.definition: A type of dragon in Southeast Asian mythology.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of the fierce naga guarding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The naga dragon was said to have multiple heads.
meanings.sent3: The villagers offered gifts to appease the mighty naga dragon.
meanings.sent4: The naga dragon's roar echoed through the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The scales of the naga dragon gleamed like precious jewels in the sun.
